title: ambOruha padhamE
sahitya:
ambOruha pAdamE nambinEn nin pon



anupallavi



shambhO shankara paramEsha guruguhamE parabramha svarUpamE SaNmukhamE

nin



caraNam



mAkALi madhura mA naTabhairavi amba taru kumAra shatakOTi madanAkAra

dEhA shrngAra shrIkara kavi kunjara vara dAsa dhAra madhuratara
